column4: i did, but it said that i needed gcc so i installed it thengetting this error.
Your kernel was built with "gcc" version "3.4.5", while you are trying to use
/usr/bin/gcc version "4.0.2". This configuration is not supported and VMware
Workstation cannot work in such configuration. Please either recompile your
kernel with "/usr/bin/gcc" version "4.0.2", or restart /usr/bin/vmware-config.plwith CC environment variable pointing to the "gcc" version "3.4.5".
but i can't get around it... i run the sudo  /usr/bin/vmware-config.pl
in a Terminal, type: dpkg -l gnopernicus|grep ^ii
gnopernicus is the utility for screen area magnification
in System> Preferences> Assistive [..] , did you check the box that starts the magnifier?
did you log out and back in after installing gnopernicus?
